record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - July 24, 2007)

[Page: S9855]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:45 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, July 25, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
